name: DEPRECATED_Extraction_Sub_DocumentTestSuiteSettings
description: Document Test Suite settings for an extraction model
sail_code:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_cardLayout"(
  contents: {
    rule!AIA_Template_ToggleField(
      value: ri!isDocumentTestCase,
      saveInto: a!save(
        ri!isDocumentTestCase,
        not(a!defaultValue(ri!isDocumentTestCase, false))
      ),
      brandingMap: ri!brandingMap,
      label: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:c43ce91b-bcb2-40f7-b945-b009f5b48b26",
      description: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:6822d8fb-6b9f-4045-ba44-a3253c8da1b1",
      defaultValue: false
    )
  },
  padding: "NONE",
  marginAbove: "LESS",
  marginBelow: "NONE",
  showBorder: false
)

calls.name: Label for Set as Test Case
Use the reconciled values from this test input as the baseline for future instan
